message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'll sell the product to you for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate the starting point.  I'm looking to get this product for a bit less, though.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get the product at a lower price. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $10,900.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget.  How about $10,700?  I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'll sell the product to you for $10,800.
